mapper.select: select o.id, u.name as done_user, uf.name as from_user, p.name as task_type, t.task_pay,t.task_desc, o.create_time from `order` o left join tasklist t on o.task_id = t.id left join task_type p on t.task_type = p.id left join `user` u on o.user_id = u.id left join `user` uf on t.task_from = uf.id where o.user_id = #{userId}
